name: AVDelegatingPlaybackCoordinatorPlayCommand
desc: A command that indicates to play at a specific rate and time.

items.name: var rate: Float
items.desc: A rate to use when starting playback.

items.name: var itemTime: CMTime
items.desc: A time in the item timeline to use to begin playback.

items.name: var hostClockTime: CMTime
items.desc: A host clock time to use to begin playback.
